input_args.passage: 'Rhys ap Tewdwr | Rhys ap Tewdwr (c. 1040 – 1093) was a king of Deheubarth in Wales and member of the Dinefwr dynasty, a branch descended from Rhodri the Great.'
input_args.claim: "To determine Tewdwr ap Peredur's rank, we refer to Context, which mentions that Rhys ap Tewdwr was a king."
